descriptionHtml:
This mod will add a new standalone follower in to the game.

Douran can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.

This is my first mod so feel free to tell if there is something wrong, and I am open to suggestions.

Requirements: none

Compatibility: it works with all mods as far as i know

Credits :Bethesda Studios for creation kit
author: N1m1k
